message: the Lanyrd SXSW API becomes enormously more useful if we know the Twitter identities of the speakers
it means you can do things like say "here's a Twitter name... are they speaking at SXSW? What sessions are they giving?"
Here's a simple crowdsourcing tool I built to help match names to twitter identities: http://sxsw-preview-api.lanyrd.net/crowdsource/2011/sxsw/
any help very much appreciated, but please make sure you associate the right people - if in doubt, reload the page and try a different one rather than risk making a mistake
